H0.text: A tissue is a group of cells performing the same function in the body.

H1.text: An organelle is a group of cells performing the same function in the body.

H2.text: An organism is a group of cells performing the same function in the body.

H3.text: A system is a group of cells performing the same function in the body.

A4.text: tissue is an assembly of similar cells and their extracellular matrix from the same embryonic origin that together carry out a specific function.

A5.text: simple permanent tissue is a group of cells that are similar in origin, structure, and function.
